org.energy_home.jemma.javagal.layers.object
Class ShortArrayObject

java.lang.Object
  org.energy_home.jemma.javagal.layers.object.ShortArrayObject

public class ShortArrayObject
extends java.lang.Object

Object carrying a byte[] of fixed length. The aims of this class is to provide byte[] reuse. An instance of ShortArrayObject contains a byte array where only the first count bytes are to be considered valid.

Author:
"Ing. Marco Nieddu or from Consoft Sistemi S.P.A., financed by EIT ICT Labs activity SecSES - Secure Energy Systems (activity id 13030)"

public static final short MAX_ARRAY_DIMENSION

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

ShortArrayObject

public ShortArrayObject()
Creates a new empty ByteArrayObject instance.

ShortArrayObject

public ShortArrayObject(short[] buffer,
                        int size)
Creates a new ByteArrayObject instance filled with a given byte[] buffer. Only the first size values present in the created byte array instance are to be considered valid.

Parameters:
buffer - the buffer of initial elements to put in the byte array object.
size - the size of the valid values on the byte array.
Method Detail

addByte

public void addByte(byte byteToAdd)
Adds a byte after the last currently valid one. Consequently the count increments by one.

Parameters:
byteToAdd - the byte to add at the end.

addOPGroup

public void addOPGroup(byte byteToAdd)
Adds the OP Group's byte to this byte array in its right position (the second byte in sequence).

Parameters:
byteToAdd - the OP Group's byte to add.

addOPCode

public void addOPCode(byte byteToAdd)
Adds the OP Codes's byte to this byte array in its right position (the third byte in sequence).

Parameters:
byteToAdd - the OP Code's byte to add.

addLength

public void addLength(byte byteToAdd)
Adds lenght's byte to this byte array in its right position (the fourth byte in sequence).

Parameters:
byteToAdd - the lenght's byte to add.

addStartSequance

public void addStartSequance(byte byteToAdd)
Adds the start sequence's byte to this byte array in its right position (the first byte in sequence).

Parameters:
byteToAdd - the start sequence's byte to add.

addBytesShort

public void addBytesShort(short valueToAdd,
                          int length)
Adds a short converted as byte(s). Writes one or two bytes containing the given short value, in Big Endian byte order (from most significant to least significant). One or two bytes is indicated by the lenght argument.

Parameters:
valueToAdd - the short to add as its byte(s) representation.
length - the desired lenght.

getByteArray

public byte[] getByteArray()
Gets the entire raw backing byte[] byte array as is. Please note that all elements in the backing array are returned, even those after the size value that are to be considered invalid.

Returns:
the byte array.

getByteArrayRealSize

public byte[] getByteArrayRealSize()
Gets the entire raw backing byte[] byte array as is. Please note that all elements in the backing array are returned, even those after the size value that are to be considered invalid.

Returns:
the byte array.

getShortArray

public short[] getShortArray()
Gets the entire raw backing byte[] byte array as is. Please note that all elements in the backing array are returned, even those after the size value that are to be considered invalid.

Returns:
the byte array.

getRealByteArray

public byte[] getRealByteArray()
Gets a byte[] containing just the valid values carried by this byte array object.

Returns:
the real byte array.

getCount

public int getCount(boolean real)
Gets the number of valid byte(s) carried by this byte array.

Parameters:
real - true if carried byte array is to be considered "real", false otherwise.
Returns:
the byte count.

ToHexString

public java.lang.String ToHexString()
Gives the entire byte array converted as a String. Every element is converted to its hexadecimal digit representation.

Returns:
the hexadecimal string representation of the entire carried byte array.
